description:
Bananya and Droopy-eared Bananya are enjoying some fishing when, to their surprise, they fish up a robot cat! They`re both thrilled to have a new friend. They play hide-and seek, take catnaps, and even run through a field of flowers together! But then the robot cat stops moving... Nya, nya...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bananya and the Robot Cat, Nya
ばなにゃとロボットにゃんこ にゃ
